snippet: Anna Wintour becomes Condé Nast’s artistic director, NPR reaches out to a younger audience and extensive police failings allowed Jimmy Savile to escape investigation for decades of sexual abuse.
abstract: Anna Wintour becomes Condé Nast’s artistic director, NPR reaches out to a younger audience and extensive police failings allowed Jimmy Savile to escape investigation for decades of sexual abuse.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Anna Wintour's New Role and NPR Appeals to the Tweet Set
